item.title: A Whale Prematurely Sells WLFI, Losing Over $5 Million in Potential Profit
item.description: On August 13th, as per the monitoring of lookonchain, the WLFI price in the presale market of the Whales Market has reached $0.37, which is approximately 25 times higher than the initial presale price.Two weeks ago, the whale address 0xe267 sold around $4.4 million worth of WLFI at an average price of around $0.17, thus missing out on potential profits of more than $5 million. In contrast, the whale address 0xebe purchased approximately $628,000 worth of WLFI at an average price of around $0.169. Currently, it has an unrealized profit of about $750,000.

item.title: The price of $WLFI reached $0.37 on the pre-market @WhalesMarket, a ~25x from its first presale price.
item.description: The price of $WLFI reached $0.37 on the pre-market @WhalesMarket, a ~25x from its first presale price. Whale 0xe267 sold ~$4.4M worth of $WLFI at an average price of ~$0.17 two weeks ago, missing out on a profit of over $5M. Meanwhile, Whale 0xebe bought ~ $628K worth of $WLFI at an average price of $0.169, giving an unrealised profit of ~$750K.

item.title: 「Brother Big Brother」 Huang Licheng Airborne Ethereum, Profits Approximately $91,000
item.description: On August 13th, according to on-chain data, "Big Brother Whale" Huang Licheng has closed all his short positions in Ethereum. He has made a profit of approximately $91,000.Earlier today, he opened an ETH short position with a leverage of 25 times and held 1,100 ETH worth $5.16 million.

item.title: European Leaders Urge Trump to Facilitate Putin-Zelensky Meeting
item.description: August 13th. On Friday, European leaders implored U.S. President Trump to prompt Putin to reach an agreement on a ceasefire and hold a meeting with Ukrainian President Zelensky during their encounter.After communicating with Trump and other European leaders, French President Macron informed reporters that any determination regarding territorial concessions would necessitate the participation of Ukraine.Macron stated: "Trump made it abundantly clear that the United States aspires to achieve a ceasefire during this meeting in Alaska, and at present, there is no substantial plan for territorial exchange on the agenda." German Chancellor Merkel reiterated that Ukraine must be involved in any relevant decision-making processes. Merkel said: "We have clearly expressed that as long as there are follow-up meetings, Ukraine will be present at the negotiation table. Trump desires to prioritize the ceasefire." (FXStreet)

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin drops below $121,000
item.description: On August 13th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin dropped below $121,000, and its 24-hour gain was narrowed to 1.32%.

item.title: Bitunix is launching HYPE spot trading, supporting the HyperEVM network
item.description: On August 13th, Bitunix has now commenced HYPE spot trading and provides full support for the HyperEVM network. The platform has simultaneously initiated the HYPE Token Splash event, enabling traders to participate in sharing a luxurious reward pool of 80,000 USDT.

item.title: H100 Group increased its holdings by 45.8 bitcoins, bringing the total holdings to 809.1 bitcoins.
item.description: On August 13th, the H100 Group announced in a post that they had augmented their holdings by 45.8 bitcoins, resulting in their total holdings reaching 809.1 bitcoins.

item.title: GMX Completes V1 Vulnerability Impact Compensation Plan, Involving $44 Million
item.description: On August 13th, GMX has achieved the successful completion of a distribution plan amounting to approximately $44 million. This plan is intended to compensate the GLP holders on Arbitrum who were impacted by the recently disclosed V1 vulnerability. Eligible wallets are now able to claim the compensation through the GMX dApp.· There is approximately $44 million available for distribution, and all affected GLP holders will receive full compensation.· The compensation is distributed in two forms of GLV tokens, which are sourced from the V2 yield-optimized GMX Treasury.· The composition of the GLV tokens is approximately 25% WBTC, 25% ETH, and 50% stablecoin.· It includes $2 million of DAO Treasury support and $500,000 of hold-to-earn GLV incentive.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Total Market Cap Surpasses $4.2 Trillion, Reaches All-Time High
item.description: On August 13th, according to Coingecko data, the combined market capitalization of cryptocurrencies has exceeded $4.2 trillion and reached $4.219 trillion, hitting a brand-new all-time high, with a 24-hour growth rate of 3.5%.

item.title: Bitget has launched U-based XNY and AIO perpetual contracts
item.description: August 13th. As per an official announcement, Bitget has declared the listing of U-Settled XNY and AIO perpetual contracts, and the contract trading BOT has been launched simultaneously.
